title: OPL Round 3 tipping
body:
Hey everyone! 

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/opl_split_1_announce.jpg?itok=aX-Y1qp7

Round three of the [Oceanic Pro League](http://oce.lolesports.com/schedule) is fast approaching!
I want to see who you think will win, check out the links below and put in your vote!
The tipping form will close at 5:30 pm AEDT on the 19th of February.

[Click here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1lOA8SJf3SR8azmQram23NuDjSdRJ9j5o4cg2njso-kk/viewform) to go to the tipping form

Last week our resident e-sports guy Riot Benji managed to pick all 8 matches correctly along with 16 other summoners! This Week anyone that can pick more matches correctly than Riot Benji will receive the **10 win IP Boost**! (If he gets them all right then you gotta match him)

**Thursday Feb 19th Games**

6pm AEDT Immunity vs Legacy
7pm approx. Legacy vs Dire Wolves
8pm approx. 4Not vs Immunity
9pm approx. Dire Wolves vs 4Not


**Monday Feb 23rd Games**

6pm AEDT	Rich Gang vs Chiefs
7pm approx.	Chiefs vs Avant Garde
8pm approx.	Sudden Fear vs Rich Gang
9pm approx.	Avant Garde vs Sudden Fear

You can catch all the action at our [twitch channel](http://www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania)

Comment below with what you picked and why!

replies.body:
